name: Chick In time
description:
You need java to run the game.

In this game, you need to solve puzzles to finish each level. You have the ability to change time to open new paths.

I'm still working on it but this shows how the game will work.

-Move your chicken with ZQSD (turn your keyboard in azerty to play with WASD)
-Press F to travel in time (you can only do it where you can do it)

Have fun!

You can follow my progress (in french) on my Youtube channel :
